tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title TEXT,
    article_content TEXT,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_news_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title TEXT,
    article_content TEXT,
    publish_date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_sentiment_scores (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES stock_news_articles(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_details (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) UNIQUE,
    company_name TEXT,
    industry TEXT,
    exchange VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_reason TEXT,
    action_taken VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES stock_details(stock_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_sentiments (
    article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    publication_date TIMESTAMP,
    author_name VARCHAR(50)
);
